chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
The charging cable does not charge the phone. Neither do other devices get charged.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We hope you’re doing well. We’re reaching out to let you know that the charging cable that your customer Helmut ordered is defective.

Please ship a replacement accessory within 48 hours and send us the tracking number. 
If you don’t have the item in stock, or can’t ship it in the next 48 hours, we’ll give them a goodwill gesture of £10 at your expense as stated in our Quality Charter. 

Please note that the new accessory should be delivered to the customer within 5 business days and that the shipment should be tracked, as per the Quality Charter.

We’ll keep an eye out for your response.

Thanks for taking care of this,

Kind regards
Derya, Back Market Customer Care

Dear BackCare,

We are willing to offer a commercial gesture for the inconvenience according to the amount stated at the Quality Charter. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR
